title: PepsiCo Aims to Replenish More Water Than It Uses
sub_head: The company plans to cut water consumption in half at sites where supply is at risk, with a goal to be ‘net water positive’ by 2030
body:
PepsiCo Inc. laid out a new plan to save water as companies grapple with water scarcity driven by rising demand and climate change.
The food-and-beverage giant said Tuesday it would set tougher water-efficiency standards at more than 1,000 company-owned and third-party facilities, nearly half of which are in areas where the water supply is under strain.
